sourcesContent:
import '../styles/tour-details.css' import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import Tours from '../pages/Tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import useFetch from './../hooks/useFetch' import { BASE_URL} from './../utils/config' const TourDetails = () => { const {id}= useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef(""); const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null); // Fetch data from the database const { data: tour } = useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${tourId}`); const{photo,title,desc,price,reviews,address,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour ; const{totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options={day : "numeric",month: "long", year: "numeric"}; const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value; } return <>

{title}

{avgRating=== 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} /per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*============== tour review section ============== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)} > 2 setTourRating(3)} > 3 setTourRating(4)} > 4 setTourRating(5)} > 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews=> (
Pranta

{new Date("12-1-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing tour
) ) }
{/*============== tour review section end ============== */}
} export default TourDetails
